page.prototype: .EncryptConnectionString as A5Storage::CallResult (BYREF EncryptedText as C, ConnectionStringIn as C [, PassphraseIn as C])

argument.name: BYREF EncryptedText
argument.description: A variable into which the encrypted connection string should be returned.

argument.name: PassphraseIn
argument.description: A passphrase to use when encrypting (optional).

return.name: result
return.description: A CallResult object with properties that describe any error returned. Check the Success property to see if the function succeeded.
